it.unibo.alchemist.boundary.gui.asmc

Interface ASMCSampler


  • public interface ASMCSampler
    A Sampler for the probability v.s. time function (see Manual), returning both mean value and confidence interval.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void batchDone(Double[] values)
      Start a new evaluation by passing a new set of values to the Sampler.
      void redraw()
      Re-computes and redraws.
      void setAutoScale()
      Causes the graph to scale to best-fit zooming level.
      void setBounds(double lowerBound, double upperBound) 
      void setConfidence(double alpha) 
      void setGranularity(double grain) 
      void setLowerBound(double lowerBound) 
      void setPlotter(ASMCPlot sp)
      Sets the plotter associated to this sampler.
      void setUpperBound(double upperBound) 

    • Method Detail

      • batchDone

        void batchDone(Double[] values)
        Start a new evaluation by passing a new set of values to the Sampler. At the end, the graph is repainted.
        Parameters:
        values - An ASCENDANT ORDERED array of time values

      • redraw

        void redraw()
        Re-computes and redraws.

      • setAutoScale

        void setAutoScale()
        Causes the graph to scale to best-fit zooming level.

      • setBounds

        void setBounds(double lowerBound,
               double upperBound)
        Parameters:
        lowerBound - The lower end of graph domain
        upperBound - The upper end of graph domain

      • setConfidence

        void setConfidence(double alpha)
        Parameters:
        alpha - Confidence value

      • setGranularity

        void setGranularity(double grain)
        Parameters:
        grain - The step

      • setLowerBound

        void setLowerBound(double lowerBound)
        Parameters:
        lowerBound - The lower end of graph domain

      • setPlotter

        void setPlotter(ASMCPlot sp)
        Sets the plotter associated to this sampler.
        Parameters:
        sp - the Plotter

      • setUpperBound

        void setUpperBound(double upperBound)
        Parameters:
        upperBound - The upper end of graph domain
